channel.title: Don't Let This Go - industry city sleepers [Electronic/Alternative]
channel.description:
![microsnip|339x145](upload://z2ocPNhKeDSS9X2L23eskLg2qR6.jpg)
[Don't Let This Go](https://soundcloud.com/icsleepers/dont-let-this-go) Something a little slower, experimented with chopping up a loop from blocs wave and manipulating the sequence of the notes in Auxy.
Comments / suggestions / weird letters appreciated :slight_smile:
Also, if anyone would like to remix / sonically destroy, please lemme know and I'll provide the needed files!
